Job Title: Sr Marketing Coordinator, Ting - Denver

Location: Centennial, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Ting Internet is a leading fiber Internet provider in the United States, delivering future-proof internet in over a dozen Ting Towns across the country.

We are rapidly growing our footprint, and with a national focus on better infrastructure, we don’t expect to slow down anytime soon!

As part of Tucows (NASDAQ:TCX, TSX:TC), Ting is backed by outstanding resources and talent. We embrace a people-first philosophy that is rooted in respect, trust, and flexibility. We believe that whatever works for our employees is what works best for us. It’s also why the majority of our roles are remote-first, meaning you can work from anywhere you can connect to the internet!

The work we do genuinely changes lives. If this sounds exciting, we’d love to hear from you!

About The Opportunity

As a Sr Marketing Coordinator you will work closely with management, as well as colleagues in various departments throughout the organization, to develop and execute local marketing initiatives in Greater Denver. You will use their creative vision, and specialized knowledge of their locality, to customize initiatives that support market brand awareness and sales goals.

The Sr Marketing Coordinator will take a certain ownership and accountability for their town, by keeping an informed business perspective of their locale, its people, and how to best to deliver on what they need.

What you'll be doing:

Implement marketing campaigns that support local sales goalsCoordinate brand hosted and third party marketing events to educate customers and/or the general public about brand's value propositions in an effort to further develop the local marketMonitor marketing budget and track sales; analyze and present data on your marketWork collaboratively on cross-functional teams to execute new offers, promotions, media tactics, and sponsorships to grow the customer baseCollaborate with the creative team to craft and ready promotional and advertising materials for the market, ensuring alignment with the established framework guidelines of shared national programs.Build and create local content for social media platforms that follow existing brand guidelinesEngage your creativity by finding new ways to engage customers


What you'll bring:

4 - 6 years proven experience in marketing or related fieldExperience in graphic design is preferredCompletion of Business, Marketing or Communication degree programEffective time management, interpersonal, and organizational skillsStrong oral and written communication skillsSelf-motivated workstyle and ability to adapt and thrive in a fast-paced and entrepreneurial environmentAbility to collaborate and build successful working relationships across various work groupsComfortable with change and can adapt quicklyIn-depth knowledge of local town, demographics and customer base


The base salary range for this position is $70,000 - $80,000. Range shown in $USD for US residents. Other countries will differ. Range may vary on a number of factors including, but not limited to: location, experience and qualifications. Tucows believes in a total rewards offering that includes fair compensation and generous benefits. Learn more about Tucows Benefits.

As a safety sensitive position, Tucows reserves the right to administer pre-employment drug testing for illegal drug use for those successful candidates presented with an offer of employment for consideration.

Tucows and its subsidiaries participate in the E-verify program for all US employees.

Want to know more about what we stand for? At Ting and Tucows we care about protecting the open Internet, narrowing digital divide, and supporting fairness and equality.

We also know that diversity drives innovation. We are committed to inclusion across race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status or disability status. We celebrate multiple approaches and diverse points of view.

We will ensure that individuals with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process, to perform essential job functions, and to receive other benefits and privileges of employment. Please contact us to request an accommodation.

What's New At Tucows

Learn more about Tucows, our businesses, culture and employee benefits on our site here.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
